overview:
I’m a Savant: People are my passion. Social Polymath, Evolved Entrepreneur, Global Futurist: Your magic carpet - I live to serve & support others

-A Big Data Scientist of Entrepreneurship-

I excel in environments that can leverage my entrepreneurial ideation, passion, & creative execution.

I come alive through working together with passionate people and creative thinkers. I recognize that the world is over 50 years behind - in my next 50 years I plan to fix that by ushering in a new era of organizational behavior, business model creativity, and philanthropic advancement for others to innovate towards new paradigms in art,science, & commerce. http://signup.viralindustries.com

PASSION: My Manifesto is to continuously discover holistic and human forward improvements on the existing Human-designed systems (Political, Social, Economic, etc.) that support us all. Like any natural, self-regulating system, it adapts; I plan to bring these same mental models of natural systems to the mechanical processes that we are embedded today. Thus creating 365+ millionaires; so as to have 365+ destinations to visit and 365+ leaders to work with while we co-operatively sustain global prosperity, year round! Join the (R)evolution within http://signup.viralindustries.com

PERCEPTION: My Creed is a symbology of aesthetic virtue: Think of me as a Magic Carpet who is on a crusade to serve People who vow to Self-Actualize by contributing, co-creating, or collaborating their resourcefulness for the Viral Industries™ covenant “To make the world a better place To Live, To Learn, and To Grow: for Everyone and for future generations”. ©

PURPOSE: My Credo illuminates my belief that I am here to unlock and harness the potential within the willing so that together we can create & connect value across all new and conventional sectors of multinational industry. Together WE CAN create a better world!

PRIVILEGE: My Philosophy is that we are all created & connected for a shared calling in life; a responsibility to serve something extraordinary from over 5 billion years of known human history - There is nothing that I can describe on Earth that is more important than that. Hence forth understand that Our success today means everything to the Successes of those after us: Come with me! Together we will move mountains!

degrees.subject: Focus: Commerce, Neuroscience, Globalization, and Self-Actualization
Focus: Art, Science, Psychology, Humanities, History, Health & Wellness
